column6:
2009...meets 2099? Future history has been shattered by events in the present! If you think you know the heroes and villains from Marvel's dark future, writer Brian Reed (SECRET INVASION: CAPTAIN MARVEL) and artist Eric Battle (Batman) say it's time to think again! Get ready for the re-imagined 2099 versions of Spider-Man, Ghost Rider, the X-Men and more! Plus 8 pages of Director's Cut Extras!,2009,4
Rated T+ ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Eric Battle | inker:Vicente Cifuentes | inker:Andrew Hennessy | colorist:Impacto - Bruno Hang | colorist:CHRISTOPHER SHY | writer:Brian Reed | letterer:Dave Sharpe
